summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Becky Martin. The documents primarily concern the payroll records of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff, focusing on individuals like Cecelia T. Morton and Nancy P. Schultz. The documents also detail the Assassination Records Review Board's decisions regarding the release and redaction of Social Security numbers and other personal information within these payroll records to protect privacy.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Becky Martin has no significance in the JFK context.
